snippet: The thieves, who operated in New York City and the surrounding region for the past three years, stole 311 cars worth an estimated $15.5 million, the police said.
abstract: New York City police arrest 16 people in theft ring that focused on luxury vehicles; thieves, who operated in New York City and surrounding region for past three years, are accused of stealing 311 cars worth estimated $15.5 million
lead_paragraph: The thieves, who operated in New York City and the surrounding region for the past three years, stole 311 cars worth an estimated $15.5 million, the police said.

headline.main: Police Break Up Luxury Car Theft Ring and Arrest 16
headline.print_headline: Police Arrest 16 as a Theft Ring That Focused on Luxury Vehicles Is Broken Up
